settings.headline: Luxury Glasses, Radically Fair Price.
settings.subheadline: For too long, buying glasses has meant a frustrating choice: pay £200+ for designer quality or settle for cheap, flimsy plastic that won't last. We knew there had to be a better way.
settings.price_subtitle: No upsells, no premium add-ons, no hidden fees. Just exceptional glasses with everything you actually need, built right into the price.
settings.features_title: Every pair of New Vantage Co. glasses comes standard with:
settings.feature_1_text: Including free anti-scratch and anti-glare coatings.
settings.feature_2_text: Choose blue light filtering for screen use or thin 1.6 high-index lenses for stronger prescriptions, at no extra cost.
settings.feature_3_text: For all sunglasses, to eliminate glare and protect your eyes.
settings.comparison_title: The Quality You Can See and Feel.
settings.table_header_col1: Our Way: The New Vantage Standard
settings.table_header_col2: The Old Way: Big Brand Markups & Cheap Alternatives
settings.table_row_1_col1: Premium Italian Acetate: Durable, substantial, with rich colours that last a lifetime.
settings.table_row_1_col2: Mass-Produced Plastic: Flimsy, brittle, and feels cheap to the touch.
settings.table_row_2_col1: Crafted and Hand-Polished: A difference in fit and finish you'll notice immediately.
settings.table_row_2_col2: Moulded & Mass-Assembled: Lacks character and durability.
settings.table_row_3_col1: Lenses Included: All the advanced features you need, standard.
settings.table_row_3_col2: Expensive Add-Ons: Price quickly doubles for polarisation or blue light filters.
settings.closing_text: It's simple. We design our glasses in-house, partner directly with the world's best craftspeople, and sell them straight to you. There are no middlemen, no retail licensing fees, and no outrageous brand markups.
